title: Driving the Future: SiC Market for Electric Vehicles Witnessing Exponential Growth with Superior Semiconductors and ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global market for silicon carbide (SiC) in electric vehicles (EVs) is expected to grow rapidly, reaching $9,031.2 million by 2032. This growth is driven by the superior properties of SiC compared to traditional silicon, the increasing demand for EVs, and investments in expanding SiC manufacturing capacity. Key players in the SiC market are collaborating and investing to develop improved SiC materials for use in EV power electronics, aiming to enhance vehicle performance and efficiency.

summary: Foxconn, the world's largest iPhone manufacturer, is ramping up hiring in China to meet demand for Apple's new iPhone 15. This comes amidst geopolitical tensions between the US and China, and the rise of Huawei despite US sanctions. Foxconn is offering bonuses to attract workers and ensure smooth production ahead of the iPhone 15 release.
